attributes.title: This app is wack🥴
attributes.review: Mama told me Cheetos are bad and now that we have on representing our nation I gotta agree🤷🏿‍♂️but the app was over all really good they even made a couple of jokes about trump being president for 2020🤣🤡

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: I do not want to see a dried up orange peal on the screen. I’m Scarred for life and will never recover from the trauma. I have therapy 7 days a week. Please somebody help me my phone is angry and me so I’m typing this on my microwave.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: it’s not even advertising correctly i saw a cheeto puff when i opened the app >:( they need to ban this app because of FALSE ADVERTISING >:( i hate this app 🚫🚫🚫🚫 tik tok 2020 :) this app is as bad as a moldy chicken nugget thrown up by a duck then the duck got run over 🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Need intensive therapy after viewing
attributes.review: Upon opening the app I was called THREE racial slurs while being bombarded with pictures of an Orange colored fat creature of some sorts. If I could give this NEGATIVE five stars I would.

attributes.title: This is dodo
attributes.review: You are banning tik tok and that is a big no no you think we want to go outside heek no it there is nothing fun to do outside so just for that I’m giving you no stars not even 1 star

attributes.title: Bad application
attributes.review:
I downloaded the app, and it immediately crashed and glitched. It then sent me to a URL on safari saying that I now had 72 viruses in my phone. 

🧚‍♂️✨delete this app✨🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: terrible❤️
attributes.review: i downloaded the app hoping to see wonderful updates about the world and the hot cheetos plans. to my surprise when i opened it up i saw a picture of a shriveled up shrimp attached to a cheeto man!! then it asked for my location which is very suspicious then the next day a man showed up and asked if i wanted some candy and tried to take me

attributes.title: App is full of orange and I don’t like it
attributes.review: I opened the app and I see a picture of a wig falling off of the president like ew no I don’t like this app only download if you like ugly Cheetos 😬🤢🤮🤮🤧🤒😷currently throwing up from this app

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: This is the worst app I have EVER downloaded in my life. It is actively trying to bring racists, fascists, and pedophiles closer together all while spreading COVID-19. Keep yourself and your family safe by staying away from this app!!

attributes.title: My trauma
attributes.review: Someone recommended this app to me and my oh my have I been traumatized. I opened the app to see an ORANGE,how ridiculous. I had to get stitches on my eyes and my mammoth had to comfort me. Thanks to this app me AND my mammoth are traumatized.
